title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / Digital Input
description: Generic digital input for non-specific sensors. objectID:'3200'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:ext:3200:1.1'. lwm2mVersion:'1.0'. objectVersion:'1.1'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Optional'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `Digital Input`.

Digital Input State.description: Property. The current state of a digital input.. resourceID:'5500'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

Digital Input Counter.description: Property. The cumulative value of active state detected.. resourceID:'5501'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Digital Input Polarity.description: Property. The polarity of the digital input as a Boolean (False = Normal, True = Reversed).. resourceID:'5502'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Digital Input Debounce.description: Property. The debounce period in ms.. resourceID:'5503'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'ms'.

Digital Input Edge Selection.description: Property. The edge selection as an integer (1 = Falling edge, 2 = Rising edge, 3 = Both Rising and Falling edge).. resourceID:'5504'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Digital Input Counter Reset.description: Property. Reset the Counter value. [Executable resource]. resourceID:'5505'. operations:'E'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Application Type.description: Property. The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.. resourceID:'5750'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Sensor Type.description: Property. The type of the sensor (for instance PIR type).. resourceID:'5751'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Timestamp.description: Property. The timestamp of when the measurement was performed.. resourceID:'5518'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Fractional Timestamp.description: Property. Fractional part of the timestamp when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).. resourceID:'6050'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'s'.
